title: 138.035 STATE HISTORICAL SOCIETY AUTHORIZED TO SUPPORT THE SCIENCE MUSEUM OF MINNESOTA.
text: The State Historical Society is authorized to enter into an agreement or agreements with the Science Museum of Minnesota whereby the State Historical Society shall make payments to such museum to support and expand its programs and to develop an extension program to bring the facilities of such museum to schools throughout the state. Such agreement or agreements shall provide for the time, amount and method of such payments.
